entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
